name: Markprompt
headline: AI for customer support
description:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

We’re building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

Scaling customer support with headcount is expensive, with human resources accounting for 90%+ of customer support expenses. On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. As companies grow, so does their expert knowledge, which is hard to access at scale and makes keeping employees up-to-date nearly impossible.

Markprompt addresses the root of the information access problem by indexing all available knowledge within a company, setting the foundation for a robust system of record to feed the AI. Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:customer-support; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Marie Schneegans, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Markprompt.

Marie and Michael previously founded Motif, a collaborative docs platform based on Markdown and React. While building Motif, we realized that the tasks of maintaining company expert knowledge up to date and providing stellar customer support are intimately connected, and both can in large part be automated. This led us to build Markprompt.

founders.name: Michael Fester, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Markprompt. Previously, cofounder of Snips (AI voice platform, acq. by Sonos).

generated_description:
**Markprompt: Revolutionizing Customer Support with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Markprompt is at the forefront of using AI to enhance customer support. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, this lean startup, with a current team of just two, aims to dramatically reduce the costs and inefficiencies associated with traditional customer support.

### Mission and Approach

Markprompt’s core mission is simple yet ambitious: *AI for customer support*. Picture the typical support operation, with human agents shouldering the massive burden of ticket handling. This method isn't just costly—it’s also prone to burnout and turnover. Markprompt is designed to tackle these issues head-on, providing a scalable AI infrastructure that helps companies automate their support processes effectively. 

Utilizing an API-first architecture, Markprompt allows for smooth integration across various customer journey touchpoints through SDKs and no-code tools. The company seeks to index internal knowledge to create a robust system from which their AI can draw insights, ensuring not only efficiency but exceptional user experiences.

### Product Offering

Markprompt specializes in creating enterprise-grade AI agents that streamline and automate customer support tasks. Here’s what they bring to the table:

- **Email Agents:** Handle incoming customer inquiries automatically, gathering necessary details and crafting responses before they even reach human agents' queues.
- **Chatbots:** Deliver round-the-clock support via web chat, in-app messages, and social media, resolving issues in real-time and reducing wait times.
- **Voice Support:** AI-powered agents ready to provide human-like assistance over the phone, ensuring customer satisfaction with accurate and timely answers.
- **Routing Agents:** Optimize ticket management by identifying the right experts for specific issues, effectively reducing resolution times.
- **Agent Assist:** Enhance human agents’ capabilities inside platforms like Zendesk and Salesforce by automating responses and case triaging.
- **Reporting and Compliance:** Automated systems for monitoring, data analysis, and ensuring adherence to regulatory standards, with a focus on security.

### The Big Picture

Markprompt understands that scaling customer support traditionally means hiring more people, which isn’t sustainable. Their solution not only minimizes the necessity of increasing headcount but also empowers support teams to focus on more complex inquiries, leaving routine tasks to the AI. 

With impressive results, such as Vercel's reported 31% reduction in human-handled tickets, Markprompt is demonstrating the potential for AI to reshape enterprise support operations across sectors, particularly in fintech and developer platforms.

### Security and Compliance

In a world where data privacy is paramount, Markprompt is SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant, with advanced features like data encryption and PII removal for safeguarding sensitive information.

### Conclusion

If you're looking to redefine your customer support landscape through innovative AI solutions, Markprompt is an intriguing contender worth exploring. Whether through seamless integration into your existing systems or comprehensive automation of support tasks, they position themselves as a partner in scaling support operations while maintaining high-quality service standards.

**For more information, check them out at [Markprompt](https://markprompt.com).**
